content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?​ Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price?​ Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The final price was not agreed upon. I was aiming for 1000 Euros per month, but the potential tenant was willing to offer 800 Euros per month and then 900 Euros per month, but I was not willing to go below 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Max Müller, as an 8. He was respectful, reasonable, and showed a genuine interest in the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
